EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Post-event Generic
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Your Interest in the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for your interest in the Leader’s Guide to Adopting Lean Startup at Scale <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers]]> workshop for Kickstarter Backers. It’s been exciting to deliver this workshop series in partnership with Eric Ries.
Whether or not you were able to attend the workshop, we thought you’d like to check out the materials:
- Presentation <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EaXdqWnlDSnQwcDRDODVLR0pqeGpqM0RMNkVj/view?usp=sharing]]> & Opener <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EeERMYzN0WEE4b2hjV0pINVk2QUZ2RjQyQW9R/view?usp=sharing]]> - Handouts <[[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7IxBOTTIF-EX0pPbWY2OG51Ui12NGdzSWlJNnBhR19rQ2xr/view?usp=sharing]]>
Want more?
- If you’re not already part of the Leader’s Guide network, sign up now <[[https://theleadersguide.org/]]>. - Interested in learning more about how Pivotal can work with you? Learn more <[[http://pivotal.io/labs]]>.
We look forward to continuing the conversation with you!
Best, Michele Perras Sr Director of Strategy Pivotal Labs
